content.webTitle: Keeping your car near Stansted airport

fields.headline: Keeping your car near Stansted airport
fields.bodyText: · There are NO cheap car stores near any major airports unless you have personal friends in the district. In any case, even a few miles would involve difficult and expensive shuttling between car and plane. Stansted does, however, have frequent train services to more practical garaging areas. You don't say in which direction from Stansted you live, but you could consider Audley End, Cambridge, Ely, March, Bishops Stortford or even Tottenham Hale, all of which have frequent Stansted connectioins. John Batts · Motorcycles and scooters can park for free at the entrance to the long stay car park (behind the control building). We have done this many times after driving up from London. It's an excellent alternative, and cheap too! Loz Ring
